newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech cbank sets O/N repo, maximum rate 31 pct.
newsitem.headline: Czech cbank sets O/N repo, maximum rate 31 pct.

text.p: The Czech National Bank (CNB) on Tuesday set a repo tender to add liquidity to the market at a maximum rate of 31 percent.
The CNB said in a statement that it would accept a maximum of two bids from each participant until 11.30 a.m. (0930 GMT), with the minimum bid set at 100 million crowns.
In the CNB's last repo tender to supply market liquidity, the average yield hit 72.37 percent.
That tender came on May 26 when the crown was under heavy pressure which had forced the central bank to choke market liquidity and raise its reverse repo rate to 75 percent.
Since then, the central bank has eased its grip on the market somewhat, with its reverse repo rate falling to 29 percent.
